applicationAcceptedAdditionalMessage:
Welcome to Sharp and Shiny! Your application looks great and we’d love to share our Classic experience with you. 🙂
 You’ll notice we have a ton of chat channels for a whole slew of topics, including individual channels for each class. You’ll find most important information, including raid and class guides, pinned in each channel, which is accessed by clicking the pin icon at the top of Discord.
 If you have any further questions, please don’t hesitate to reach out to an officer!
applicationDeniedAdditionalMessage: Please check out the Bloodsail Buccaneers server community Discord if you’d like to find other guilds to apply to: https://discord.gg/SZZ369B

questions.6: What spec will you be playing? Link from a talent calculator (https://classic.wowhead.com/talent-calc)
questions.7: Are you coming from another guild? If so, which guild and why are you leaving?
questions.8: How did you hear about Sharp and Shiny, and what made you apply?
questions.9: How extensive is your organized raiding experience? The more details the better
questions.10: Do you have parses on warcraftlogs? If so, please provide a link.
questions.11: What do you think is more important for a successful PvE progression guild: attitude or skill? Why?
questions.12: When are your usual playtimes? What occupies the bulk of your time in-game? (PvP, PvE, RP, etc.)
questions.13: We are on an RP-PvE server, but as a guild, we do not participate in RP. Is this in any way an issue?
questions.14: Do you have a referral or know anyone in the guild?
